About Me

Hello, I'm Melody

I dedicate myself to crafting eye-catching websites with a strong attention to the way users interact with them. I stand for building meaningful and engaging digital experiences accessible to all, making a point of developping layouts that will adapt to different type of media, whether it's a desktop monitor, a tablet or mobile phone.

Coming from a different career path, my skills are quite varied, including illustration : whether it's a set of icons, a character or a full environment, anything is possible.

In a past life

In a past life

I've worked in the Visual Effects industry as a Lead Environment TD in London, and a Virtual Art Department Set Lead in Los Angeles, building CG environments for movies. Click here to see my demoreel.

My collaboration with the Software Department made me discover the world of programming, as well as UX and UI challenges. Combined with my past Visual Communication and Graphic Design studies, it lead me towards front-end web development and web design.

Make it happen

Make it happen

It's a passion for anything digital and a strong will to succeed in this new career path that animates me. I am constantly learning and always up for a new challenge. My previous career gave me a broad set of organisational and creative skills as well as a habit to collaborate with a wide range of people.

To strenghten my skills, I am now looking for an internship or a junior position, if you'd like to talk about it, please do not hesitate to contact me.

A few fun facts

A few fun facts

  • – I have lived in 3 different countries
  • – I've held the Best Visual Effect Oscar, BAFTA and VES awards for the Jungle Book movie, being part of the incredible team that put it together.
  • – I've hidden one of the 'easter egg' Mickey Mouse on the Jungle Book movie.
